description: Combat experience thresholds for weapon proficiency advancement

notes.overview: Each threshold represents the number of combats required to advance between proficiency levels.
notes.combatCounting: A combat is counted when the character participates in battle using a weapon from the given category.
notes.experienceReset: Combat experience resets to 0 when advancing to the next level.
notes.totalCombats: Total combats to master a category: 85 (from NonProficient) or 75 (from Proficient).

nonProficientToProficient.description: Learning basics - removes NonProficient penalties (-3 attack, -2 damage)

expertToMaster.description: Achieving mastery - grants +2 attack, +1 damage, max techniques

balanceNotes.rationale: Exponential progression creates meaningful milestones. The 10-combat entry point allows quick removal of non-proficiency penalties, while mastery requires significant investment.
balanceNotes.archetypeAdvantage: Characters with archetype proficiencies skip the first 10 combats, starting directly at Proficient level.
